plot: A visitor comes from a faraway land, Australia. No, New Guinea.....whatever, to visit Hannah, Tony & Miles. He has braved the horrors of the global undead in his adventures, but is perhaps not ready for what awaits him at the Zomblog flat.
title: "Zomblogalypse" Kiwi
plot_es: A visitor comes from a faraway land, Australia. No, New Guinea.....whatever, to visit Hannah, Tony & Miles. He has braved the horrors of the global undead in his adventures, but is perhaps not ready for what awaits him at the Zomblog flat.
